channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2023110985
item.description:
Report X-2023110985

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: WEST LEBANON
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Carton was removed from trailer and 1 of 4 1-gallon jugs fell out through the bottom of the carton because of fiberboard deterioration due to acid leakage. The package was immediately turned over to trained personnel who contained the spillage. DescribePack: The cap on the bottle in question was not sufficiently tightened, and there is a possibility the carton was tilted from an upright position during transport or handling. There were orientation arrows on the carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The leaking container was sequestered and had its cap carefully tightened to minimize further leakage.

item.title: Report X-2023110895
item.description:
Report X-2023110895

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-08
  • City: WEST LEBANON
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking on trailer and turned over to trained personnel who contained the spillage. DescribePack: Apparently this was a loose cap on one of the bottles, and the likelihood that the package was not kept upright during transport or handling. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The package and one it leaked onto were both sequestered and are being held securely pending receipt of disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023111036
item.description:
Report X-2023111036

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: KEENE
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: EMPLOYEE CALLED TO PRIMARY AND FOUND LEAKING CARDBOARD BOX WITH HAZARDOUS DIAMOND LABELS ON OUTSIDE. RESPONDER BROUGHT PACKAGE TO DMP AND OPENED BOX. RESPONDER FOUND ONE GALLON WAS LEAKING FROM LOOSE CAP. RESPONDER FOLLOWED DMP PROCEDURE.

item.title: Report X-2023110326

Report X-2023110326

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-30
  • City: DOVER
  • State: NH

  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS SENT OUT TO BE DELIVERED CAME BACK WITH DRIVER CLERK HEARD NOICE OF SHIFTING CANS OPEN TO FIND UNDECLARED AEROSOLS.
